OW Hacienda Farm Module Dung Moderate

English.Text: Widespread use of dung and horse-drawn ploughs revolutionises agriculture

Farmers are baffled after introduction of newly developed horse-drawn equipment. Yields are skyrocketing into oblivion. Soon, an interviewed farmer said, he could feed his village all by himself with the help of this new miricale steel plough! We expect [Participants Current Profile CompanyName] will once again chevron a path in the soil for others to follow.
